content.rendered:
New 3D lashes to go with your new lash adhesive eyeliner. Up your lash game with my new D’Lashes Adhesive Eyeliner that was in the press in Women’s Wear Daily, InStyle.com, and so many more publications. 

Check out the full InStyle Magazine article by clicking here InStyle.com

This Amazing Pen will make your strip lash application a game changer! This D’Modern liquid adhesive liner acts as a dual purpose high drama felt tip pen. It  draws a high-pigment, flawless line. Features a super-fine felt tip for precise application. 

The D’Felt adhesive tip liner is great for a cat eye, or just for giving an extreme thick line for more Drama! “Line, Lash and Done!

Click on the following product names to shop – D’Lashes Matte Lipstick, D’Lashes Candles, New Lash Adhesive Eyeliner, and lash out with D’Medium Flare individual lashes.

Xo Xo, Dionne
